item.title: Hedge is massively overhanging pavement, 1st August
item.description:
Hedge is obstructing and massively overhanging a large proportion of the pavement, and has been for a few months. It needs to be trimmed back. The hedge is next to 45 Belvedere Road and the car park of 51 Belvedere Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 45, Belvedere Road, Crystal Palace, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping in Chipstead Close car park, 1st August
item.description:
A number of boxes, shelving unit and a TV have been flytipped in the Chipstead Close car park. I think they have been left there in the last couple of days

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Anerley Grove, Crystal Palace, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overhanging Tree, 1st August
item.description:
On Long Lane at the junction with Erith Road, Bexleyheath: Low hanging branches from a tree on the pavement are obscuring a circular blue street sign warning drivers of a mini-roundabout ahead. Please could these branches be cut back so that the street sign is easily visible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Long Lane, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet
